name: fulstack-back-office
description: Back office pour le projet Fullstack
author: Fullstack

scripts.build:dev: npm run prepare-build && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev webpack --config=configs/webpack/prod.js
scripts.build:qualif: npm run prepare-build && cross-env NODE_ENV=qualif webpack --config=configs/webpack/prod.js
scripts.build:preprod: npm run prepare-build && cross-env NODE_ENV=preprod webpack --config=configs/webpack/prod.js
scripts.build:prod: npm run prepare-build && cross-env NODE_ENV=prod webpack --config=configs/webpack/prod.js
scripts.prepare-build: npm run clean-dist && npm run build:css
